scripts.dev: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192 NODE_PATH=src NODE_ENV=development nodemon -r tsconfig-paths/register --watch src --delay 1 --exec 'ts-node' ./bin/www.ts
scripts.prod: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192 NODE_PATH=src NODE_ENV=production nodemon -r tsconfig-paths/register --watch src --delay 1 --exec 'ts-node' ./bin/www.ts
scripts.start:pm2: yarn build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production
scripts.deploy-patch:
clear;printf "


";npm version patch --no-git-tag-version;printf "


 푸시하시고, 머지요청하셔야 패치됩니다.












";printf "https://github.com/Haneum-Park/boilerplate-koa/compare

";git add package.json && git commit && git push
scripts.deploy-minor:
clear;printf "


";npm version minor --no-git-tag-version;printf "


 푸시하시고, 머지요청하셔야 패치됩니다.












";printf "https://github.com/Haneum-Park/boilerplate-koa/compare

";git add package.json && git commit && git push
scripts.deploy-major:
clear;printf "


";npm version major --no-git-tag-version;printf "


 푸시하시고, 머지요청하셔야 패치됩니다.












";printf "https://github.com/Haneum-Park/boilerplate-koa/compare

";git add package.json && git commit && git push
